name: 7.25 AN HOUR?!
description:
You play a frazzled hotel concierge, delivering items from the lost and found to disgruntled customers. playable only with mouse.

Give the requested item to the correct tenant!

Credits:

Game Director - Wyatt Bushnell

Programming - Wyatt Bushnell

Lead Artist - Wyatt Bushnell

Character VO - Wyatt Bushnell

Credit Writer - Wyatt Bushnell

Sound FX - Wyatt Bushnell

Morale Improver - Wyatt Bushnell
